newsitem.title: PERU: Lima shares end down amid continued pessimism.
newsitem.headline: Lima shares end down amid continued pessimism.

text.p: Shares on the Lima stock exchange closed soft Thursday in low volume as concern over the economy's slow growth rate kept investors on the sidelines, where they have been for the last month, brokers said.
They added the market was expected to continue depressed this week because of investor pessimism for a return to stronger growth.
Thursday, the General Index fell 0.21 percent to 1,476.6 points, and the blue-chip Selective Index fell 0.07 percent to 2,083.3 points, according to preliminary stock figures.
